cost-effective.translation[0].definition: bringing the best possible profits or advantages for the lowest possible costs
The procedure is quick, easy to use, and cost effective.
the most cost-effective way of reducing carbon dioxide emissions
cost-effective.translation[1].definition: bringing the best possible advantages in relation to costs
Private banking isnâ€™t cost-effective for the consumer with less than about $200,000, as those customers can get most basic services at lower fees from regular banks.
